In this sketch, there are two faces (face\\_1 and face\\_2), each containing a loop (loop\\_1) of a single circle (circle\\_1). The circle has the following properties: * Center: [0.1408, 0.1408] * Radius: 0.1408 For scaling, set the sketch\\_scale to 0.2816. For the extrusion, use a depth of 0.0246 towards the normal and 0.0 opposite the normal. The operation for this part is to create a new solid body. Part 2: Rectangular Prism with Hole Now, create the second part of the assembly, which is a rectangular prism with a hole in the center. Begin by creating a new coordinate system with the following properties: * Euler Angles: [0.0, 0.0, -90.0] * Translation Vector: [0.088, 0.0246, 0.0] Now, create the sketch for this part, which includes: 1. face\\_1, containing a loop with four lines (line\\_1 to line\\_4) forming a rectangle. 2. face\\_3, containing a loop with a circle (circle\\_1). The dimensions of the rectangle for face\\_1 are as follows: * Line\\_1: [0.0, 0.0] to [0.662, 0.0] * Line\\_2: [0.662, 0.0] to [0.662, 0.4814] * Line\\_3: [0.662, 0.4814] to [0.0, 0.4814] * Line\\_4: [0.0, 0.4814] to [0.0, 0.0] The hole's circle has the following properties: * Center: [0.324, 0.2318] * Radius: 0.1408 For scaling, set the sketch\\_scale to 0.662. For the extrusion, use a depth of 0.0033 opposite the normal. The operation for this part is to create a new solid body. The final shape will be a three-dimensional, rectangular prism with a cylindrical hole in the center. The height, width, and length of the shape are approximately 0.0246, 0.662, and 0.662, respectively, while the height, width, and length of the smaller circular object are approximately 0.0246, 0.2816, and 0.2816, respectively.</description>
